name: Space Raid
overview: Guide your fighter through enemy territory. Drop to ground level to blow up fuel tanks and gun turrets. Encounter and destroy enemy squadrons in space, but avoid their missiles. Inspired by the arcade classic, you won’t believe the 2600 can do this! If this game had been released in the 80s instead of now it would have been a million seller. Blows the originally released attempt at a home port out of the sky!
